verses.text:
Then the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w Go|strong="H0935"\w* in unto \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w*, and \w tell|strong="H1696"\w* him, Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of the \w Hebrews|strong="H5680"\w*, Let my \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w go|strong="H7971"\w*, that they may \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* me.
For if thou \w refuse|strong="H3986"\w* to let \add them\add* \w go|strong="H7971"\w*, and wilt \w hold|strong="H2388"\w* them still,

Behold, the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w is|strong="H1961"\w* upon thy \w cattle|strong="H4735"\w* which \add is\add* in the \w field|strong="H7704"\w*, upon the \w horses|strong="H5483"\w*, upon the \w asses|strong="H2543"\w*, upon the \w camels|strong="H1581"\w*, upon the \w oxen|strong="H1241"\w*, and upon the \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w*: \add there shall be\add* a \w very|strong="H3966"\w* \w grievous|strong="H3515"\w* \w murrain|strong="H1698"\w*.

And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* shall \w sever|strong="H6395"\w* between the \w cattle|strong="H4735"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* and the \w cattle|strong="H4735"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*: and there shall \w nothing|strong="H1697"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w* of all \add that is\add* the \w children’s|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

And the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w appointed|strong="H7760"\w* a set \w time|strong="H4150"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, To \w morrow|strong="H4279"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* shall \w do|strong="H6213"\w* this \w thing|strong="H1697"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*.

And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* that \w thing|strong="H1697"\w* on the \w morrow|strong="H4283"\w*, and all the \w cattle|strong="H4735"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* \w died|strong="H4191"\w*: but of the \w cattle|strong="H4735"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w died|strong="H4191"\w* not \w one|strong="H0259"\w*.

And \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w*, and, behold, there was not \w one|strong="H0259"\w* of the \w cattle|strong="H4735"\w* of the \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* \w dead|strong="H4191"\w*. And the \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* of \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w* was \w hardened|strong="H3513"\w*, and he did not let the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w go|strong="H7971"\w*.

¶ And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* and unto \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w*, \w Take|strong="H3947"\w* to you \w handfuls|strong="H2651"\w* of \w ashes|strong="H6368"\w* of the \w furnace|strong="H3536"\w*, and let \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w sprinkle|strong="H2236"\w* it toward the \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w* in the \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* of \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w*.

And it shall become small \w dust|strong="H0080"\w* in all the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, and shall be a \w boil|strong="H7822"\w* breaking \w forth|strong="H6524"\w* \add with\add* \w blains|strong="H0076"\w* upon \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, and upon \w beast|strong="H0929"\w*, throughout all the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*.

And they \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w ashes|strong="H6368"\w* of the \w furnace|strong="H3536"\w*, and \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w*; and \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w sprinkled|strong="H2236"\w* it up toward \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*; and it became a \w boil|strong="H7822"\w* breaking \w forth|strong="H6524"\w* \add with\add* \w blains|strong="H0076"\w* upon \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, and upon \w beast|strong="H0929"\w*.

And the \w magicians|strong="H2748"\w* \w could|strong="H3201"\w* not \w stand|strong="H5975"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w because|strong="H6440"\w* of the \w boils|strong="H7822"\w*; for the \w boil|strong="H7822"\w* was upon the \w magicians|strong="H2748"\w*, and upon all the \w Egyptians|strong="H4714"\w*.

And the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w hardened|strong="H2388"\w* the \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* of \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w*, and he \w hearkened|strong="H8085"\w* not unto them; as the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* had \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*.

¶ And the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, Rise up \w early|strong="H7925"\w* in the \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*, and \w stand|strong="H3320"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w*, and \w say|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of the \w Hebrews|strong="H5680"\w*, Let my \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w go|strong="H7971"\w*, that they may \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* me.

For I will at this \w time|strong="H6471"\w* \w send|strong="H7971"\w* all my \w plagues|strong="H4046"\w* upon thine \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*, and upon thy \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*, and upon thy \w people|strong="H5971"\w*; that thou mayest \w know|strong="H3045"\w* that \add there is\add* none like me in all the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*.

For now I will stretch \w out|strong="H7971"\w* my \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, that I may \w smite|strong="H5221"\w* thee and thy \w people|strong="H5971"\w* with \w pestilence|strong="H1698"\w*; and thou shalt be cut \w off|strong="H3582"\w* from the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*.

And in \w very|strong="H0199"\w* \w deed|strong="H5668"\w* for this \add cause\add* have I raised thee \w up|strong="H5975"\w*, for to \w shew|strong="H7200"\w* \add in\add* thee my \w power|strong="H3581"\w*; and that my \w name|strong="H8034"\w* may be \w declared|strong="H5608"\w* throughout all the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*.\f + \fr 9.16 \ft raised…: Heb. made thee stand\f*
As yet \w exaltest|strong="H5549"\w* thou thyself against my \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, that thou wilt not let them \w go|strong="H7971"\w*?

Behold, to \w morrow|strong="H4279"\w* about this \w time|strong="H6256"\w* I will cause it to \w rain|strong="H4305"\w* a \w very|strong="H3966"\w* \w grievous|strong="H3515"\w* \w hail|strong="H1259"\w*, such as hath not \w been|strong="H3644"\w* in \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* \w since|strong="H4480"\w* the \w foundation|strong="H3117"\w* thereof even until now.

\w Send|strong="H7971"\w* therefore now, \add and\add* \w gather|strong="H5756"\w* thy \w cattle|strong="H4735"\w*, and all that thou hast in the \w field|strong="H7704"\w*; \add for upon\add* every \w man|strong="H0120"\w* and \w beast|strong="H0929"\w* which shall be \w found|strong="H4672"\w* in the \w field|strong="H7704"\w*, and shall not be \w brought|strong="H0622"\w* \w home|strong="H1004"\w*, the \w hail|strong="H1259"\w* shall come \w down|strong="H3381"\w* upon them, and they shall \w die|strong="H4191"\w*.

He that \w feared|strong="H3373"\w* the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* among the \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* of \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w* made his \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* and his \w cattle|strong="H4735"\w* \w flee|strong="H5127"\w* into the \w houses|strong="H1004"\w*:

And he that \w regarded|strong="H7760"\w* not the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w left|strong="H5800"\w* his \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* and his \w cattle|strong="H4735"\w* in the \w field|strong="H7704"\w*.\f + \fr 9.21 \ft regarded…: Heb. set not his heart unto\f*

¶ And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, Stretch \w forth|strong="H5186"\w* thine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* toward \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*, that there may be \w hail|strong="H1259"\w* in all the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, upon \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, and upon \w beast|strong="H0929"\w*, and upon every \w herb|strong="H6212"\w* of the \w field|strong="H7704"\w*, throughout the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*.

And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* stretched \w forth|strong="H5186"\w* his \w rod|strong="H4294"\w* toward \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*: and the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w sent|strong="H5414"\w* \w thunder|strong="H6963"\w* and \w hail|strong="H1259"\w*, and the \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* ran \w along|strong="H1980"\w* upon the \w ground|strong="H0776"\w*; and the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w rained|strong="H4305"\w* \w hail|strong="H1259"\w* upon the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*.

So there was \w hail|strong="H1259"\w*, and \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* \w mingled|strong="H8432"\w* with the \w hail|strong="H1259"\w*, \w very|strong="H3966"\w* \w grievous|strong="H3515"\w*, such as there was \w none|strong="H3808"\w* like it in all the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* since it became a \w nation|strong="H1471"\w*.

And the \w hail|strong="H1259"\w* \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* throughout all the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* all that \add was\add* in the \w field|strong="H7704"\w*, both \w man|strong="H0120"\w* and \w beast|strong="H0929"\w*; and the \w hail|strong="H1259"\w* \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* every \w herb|strong="H6212"\w* of the \w field|strong="H7704"\w*, and \w brake|strong="H7665"\w* every \w tree|strong="H6086"\w* of the \w field|strong="H7704"\w*.
Only in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Goshen|strong="H1657"\w*, where the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \add were\add*, was there no \w hail|strong="H1259"\w*.

¶ And \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w*, and \w called|strong="H7121"\w* for \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* and \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, I have \w sinned|strong="H2398"\w* this \w time|strong="H6471"\w*: the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \add is\add* \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w*, and I and my \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \add are\add* \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w*.

\w Intreat|strong="H6279"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* (for \add it is\add* \w enough|strong="H7227"\w*) that there be no \add more\add* \w mighty|strong="H0430"\w* \w thunderings|strong="H6963"\w* and \w hail|strong="H1259"\w*; and I will let you \w go|strong="H7971"\w*, and ye shall \w stay|strong="H5975"\w* no \w longer|strong="H3254"\w*.\f + \fr 9.28 \ft mighty…: Heb. voices of God\f*

And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, As soon as I am gone \w out|strong="H3318"\w* of the \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, I will spread \w abroad|strong="H6566"\w* my \w hands|strong="H3709"\w* unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*; \add and\add* the \w thunder|strong="H6963"\w* shall \w cease|strong="H2308"\w*, neither shall there be any more \w hail|strong="H1259"\w*; that thou mayest \w know|strong="H3045"\w* how that the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* \add is\add* the 
d \+w LORD’s|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.
But as for thee and thy \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*, I \w know|strong="H3045"\w* that ye will not yet \w fear|strong="H3372"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

And the \w flax|strong="H6594"\w* and the \w barley|strong="H8184"\w* was \w smitten|strong="H5221"\w*: for the \w barley|strong="H8184"\w* \add was\add* in the \w ear|strong="H0024"\w*, and the \w flax|strong="H6594"\w* \add was\add* \w bolled|strong="H1392"\w*.

But the \w wheat|strong="H2406"\w* and the \w rie|strong="H3698"\w* were not \w smitten|strong="H5221"\w*: for \w they|strong="H2007"\w* \add were\add* not grown \w up|strong="H0648"\w*.\f + \fr 9.32 \ft not grown…: Heb. hidden or, dark\f*

And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* went \w out|strong="H3318"\w* of the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* from \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w*, and spread \w abroad|strong="H6566"\w* his \w hands|strong="H3709"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: and the \w thunders|strong="H6963"\w* and \w hail|strong="H1259"\w* \w ceased|strong="H2308"\w*, and the \w rain|strong="H4306"\w* was not \w poured|strong="H5413"\w* upon the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*.

And when \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* that the \w rain|strong="H4306"\w* and the \w hail|strong="H1259"\w* and the \w thunders|strong="H6963"\w* were \w ceased|strong="H2308"\w*, he \w sinned|strong="H2398"\w* yet \w more|strong="H3254"\w*, and \w hardened|strong="H3513"\w* his \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*, he and his \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*.

And the \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* of \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w* was \w hardened|strong="H2388"\w*, neither would he let the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w go|strong="H7971"\w*; as the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* had \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* \w by|strong="H3027"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*.\f + \fr 9.35 \ft by Moses: Heb. by the hand of Moses\f*
